exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R eps : posreal N : nat Unable to unify "(0 <= ?M2379)%nat" with "(N <= 0)%nat".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
In environment u : nat -> R eps : posreal n : nat Hn : (0 <= n)%nat Unable to unify "(0 <= n)%nat" with "0 < u n".

original: exists (Finite 0). unfold is_LimInf_seq. intros eps. split. - intros N. exists O. split. + apply Nat.le_0_l. + rewrite Rbar_minus_eq. unfold Rminus. rewrite Rplus_0_r. apply cond_pos_eps. - exists O. intros n Hn. apply Rlt_trans with (r2:=0). + apply (proj1 (cond_pos_eps eps)). + apply Hn.
